title: Health Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Concern Worldwide (Dublin, Dublin) in Jul 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was lengthy spread across several days. They conducted the interviews online which required applicants to record a video answering 10 questions, make a powerpoint presentation, and several one-on-one question and answer.
Interview Questions: 1.  Recall a work situation where you handled a challenging manager?

title: Administration Interview
Interview Descriptions: Tricky but friendly, good easy system from start to finish, I understood all the steps. I didn't get the job but I would apply again, I think I can do better the next time. The offices are nice and I did find the process good. Bad coffee but not sure I'd that matters! The hiring and interview process was overall OK and I couldn't really complain about it except of course i didnt get the job I wanted

title: Marketing Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Concern Worldwide (Dublin, Dublin) in Oct 2020
Interview Descriptions: CV sent online, then receive an email requesting a interview. First a video interview with machine with around 5 questions. Then a task to be completed prior a panel interview with managers. It's all managed in a website system.
Interview Questions: How did you manage a difficult situation that happened with you?

title: Communications Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Concern Worldwide
Interview Descriptions: Applied online through their website. Application included full cv and cover letter. Received a call from HR approx one week later. First round interview was panel based on competency based questions and looking at previous experience combination.
Interview Questions: Last media article I read regarding any international aid agency

title: Door to Door Sales Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Concern Worldwide (Dublin, Dublin) in Aug 2018
Interview Descriptions: Customer service working with a team. How to deal with upset customers and how would you deal with people on a team and how to keep pushing forward as a team
Interview Questions: Customer service working with a team. How to deal with upset customers and how would you deal with people on a team and how to keep pushing forward as a team

title: Programme Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Concern Worldwide (Dublin, Dublin) in Jun 2018
Interview Descriptions: First an online video interview, with more technical questions, followed by a skype interview with questions on management and code of conduct as well as some technical. The questions were asked by an HR person and a desk officer
Interview Questions: What will you do when you meet your new staff for the first time

title: Major Donor Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Concern Worldwide in Jul 2017
Interview Descriptions: Interview by way of computer programme. Not a skype phone call as I initially thought. Instead I was asked to record short 3 min answers. Unusual but not awful. A bit nerve wracking.
Interview Questions: What would you do on your first day at work?

title: Research Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Concern Worldwide (Dublin, Dublin) in May 2017
Interview Descriptions: I applied online and then received and email saying I was to complete an online interview with Sonru. It was my first time using Sonru and it was quite hard, I wasn't fully prepared for the more 'technical' questions. Then I had a face-to-face interview with two members of staff which went well also.
Interview Questions: Organising my work/ General skills in the area

title: Receptionist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Concern Worldwide (Dublin, Dublin) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: Two panel interview, was quite informal and just seeing why I was interested in the organisation and what I felt I could bring to the role. Quite quick turn around and I received offer after confirmation of references.
Interview Questions: Why Concern in particular, would I be interested in carrying out any work overseas if I was to be given the opportunity down the line.

title: Fundraiser Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Concern Worldwide (Cork) in Dec 2012
Interview Descriptions: I applied in December and was called to interview within two days. The day following the interview I was called with an offer. The contract took another couple of days to draw up and I started in January. The process was very easy and the hiring manager stayed in contact throughout.
Interview Questions: What experience do you have in target driven environments which you feel can be applied to this position.
